H0.text: Which famous Englishman was born in Lichfield in Staffordshire in 1709. Samuel Johnson

H1.text: Which famous Englishman was born in Lichfield in Staffordshire in 1709. Erasmus Darwin

H2.text: Which famous Englishman was born in Lichfield in Staffordshire in 1709. David Garrick

H3.text: Which famous Englishman was born in Lichfield in Staffordshire in 1709. Johnsonism

A4.text: Samuel Johnson was born in Lichfield, Staffordshire, on 18 September 1709.

A5.text: His mother was 40 when she gave birth to Johnson in the family home above his father's bookshop in Lichfield, Staffordshire.
